deleteSegment: This action will delete the segment and its content. Are you sure?
deleteSignature: This action will delete the signature field. Are you sure?
overrideSignature: This action will override the previous signature. Are you sure?
clearAllSignatures: This action will clear all signatures! Are you sure?
changesInIncomingMinutes: There are changes in the incoming minutes. Are you sure you want to overwrite the current minutes?
clearDocument: This action will clear the whole document. Are you sure?
storeDocument: This action will store the document in the cloud where it will be accessible to anyone with the provided link. Are you sure?
changesInMinutes: There are changes in the incoming minutes. Are you sure you want to overwrite the current minutes?
problemLoadingMinutes: There was a problem loading minutes
overwriteConfirmation: This action will overwrite cached minutes. Are you sure?
differentVersionDetectedConfirmation: There is a different version of this saved minutes in the cloud. Do you want to reload? Otherwise, consider saving.
